text: Charles Koete"Contextualizing Theology in the South Pacific: The Shape of Theology in Oral Cultures" . Prior, R.G. p161:Eugene, Oregon; Wipf and Stock; 2019 (d 1 October 2012)AB Mission was the inaugural Anglican Bishop of Central Solomons, one of the nine dioceses that make up the Anglican Church of Melanesia.World Anglican He served from 1997 to 2011.ACOM ==References== Category:Living people Category:Anglican bishops in Oceania Category:21st- century Anglican bishops Category:20th-century Anglican bishops Category:Bishops of Central Solomons Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Charles Koete
